FuncDef:
The phy-number command sets the number of a flexible Ethernet physical interface in a FlexE Group.
Using the undo phy-number command, you can cancel the setting of the phy-number parameter for a physical interface in flexible Ethernet mode.
By default,the phy-number parameter is not set.

ParaDef.Info:
Used for packet identification. This parameter must be set to the same value for physical interfaces on the interconnected devices in flexible Ethernet mode.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 254.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To ensure normal communication between the interconnected devices, you need to run the phy-number command on the physical interfaces of the flexible Ethernet modes at both ends to set the same parameters.
Precautions
The phy-number for 50 Gbit/s FlexE physical interfaces ranges from 1 to 126.
